name: Running Factory
description:
Running Factory is a student game project made in 5 months time, here is the team behind this game:

  • Florence Roland : Lead production, Houdini tools, FX and UI
  • Clara Schweitzer : 3D Artist, Machines and Props
  • Florian Obchette : 3D Environment Artist
  • Loris Rossi : Lead Gameplay Programmer
  • Vincent Bertieaux : Gameplay and AI Programmer

We would like to thank these people that have helped us reach our goal:

  • Guillaume Cazenave : Musical Composer
  • Irénée Matuszewski : SFX Designer
  • Hugo Costarelli : Character Animator

This game was designed to be played with an XBOX controller (Keyboard works fine for player 1)

Supported locales for this game: EN (English)

Join the discord to share your ideas about this project: https://discord.gg/fBPGBbKTdp

If you enjoy the game, leave us a comment below !
